solution_line_template: Kenley has {kenley_multiplier} * {mckenna_animals} stuffed animals = <<{kenley_multiplier}*{mckenna_animals}={kenley_animals}>>{kenley_animals} stuffed animals.
Tenly has {kenley_animals} stuffed animals + {tenly_more_than_kenley} = <<{kenley_animals}+{tenly_more_than_kenley}={tenly_animals}>>{tenly_animals} stuffed animals.
The three girls total had {mckenna_animals} + {kenley_animals} + {tenly_animals} = <<{mckenna_animals}+{kenley_animals}+{tenly_animals}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} stuffed animals
